p: As opposed to the model with cross-reactivity, here, a circulation model in which French Guiana experienced a recent MAYV outbreak was as adequate as a model of constant circulation (DIC = 3599 and DIC = 3600); age (OR: 0.8, 95%CrI: 0.4–1.3) and sex were no longer significant risk factors for MAYV infection (OR: 1.2, 95% CrI: 0.9–1.6).
